divs: sighting detailswatchig the sky with binocculars (as i do often now since my first sighting ) about 35 min. later i see a black ball \ shpere with a plasma like light emitting from it . at times would get intense , then dim , at times would go out to black , but still visible. this lasted about ten to twelve min. until house blocked my view. i stared at this "object" til my arms were fatigued and tears stream down my cheek from holdind the binocculars ! i tried not to blink or make a move ,so i would'nt lose it.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York

Summary: a' black ball' looking object that emitted a plasma like light at times would get intense to dim in a sort of pulsing effect !
